title: How to Educate Yourself on DeFi - Kiplinger's Personal Finance
content: How to Educate Yourself on DeFi  Kiplinger's Personal Finance
description: Unless you’ve been living under a rock, you’ve heard about Bitcoin. But Ethereum is a different form of cryptocurrency nipping at Bitcoin’s heels. It’s based on a decentralized finance model, or DeFi, which has implications far broader than just crypto. Here’s a primer on DeFi, and a bevy of sources for in-depth learning.
